DOC.brief_summary: To compare patient comfort overall lens cleanliness consecutive use two multipurpose lens solution .
DOC.brief_title: Comfort Cleaning Evaluation Multipurpose Solutions Contact Lens Patients
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients 18 yrs old 2 . Males females 3 . Any race ethnic background 4 . CL patient use OptiFree Express norub MPS currently 5 . Patients use Focus night day Lenses 1 . Corneal refractive surgery within 6 month study . 2 . Corneal ectasia . 3 . Current use Restasis
